Class PlatformStatsPlugIn

  • java.lang.Object

    public class PlatformStatsPlugIn
extends Object
implements IPlugIn<Journal,AbstractStatisticsCollector>
    IPlugin for collecting statistics from the operating system.
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Method Detail

      • startService

        public void startService(Journal indexManager)
        Start the service.

        Start collecting performance counters from the OS (if enabled).

        Specified by:
        startService in interface IPlugIn<Journal,AbstractStatisticsCollector>

      • stopService

        public void stopService(boolean immediateShutdown)
        Stop the service.

        NOP - Collection is on the JVM and the OS. If it is shutdown with each Journal shutdown, then collection would wind up disabled with the first Journal shutdown even if there is more than one open Journal.

        Specified by:
        stopService in interface IPlugIn<Journal,AbstractStatisticsCollector>
        Parameters:
        immediateShutdown - true if the service should be stopped immediately.
